_documentation: Tool descriptions for LLM-judged metrics. These help the evaluator understand what each tool can and cannot do.

search_places.description: Searches for businesses/places matching a query using the Google Maps Places API.
capabilities: Search for competitors by type and location
Retrieve ratings, address, and place ID

generate_html_report.description: Generates a McKinsey/BCG style 7-slide HTML executive report and saves it as an artifact.

generate_infographic.description: Generates a visual infographic summary using Gemini 3 Pro Image model and saves it as an artifact.

IntakeAgent.description: Parses user requests to extract target location and business type.
